item.title: Nigerian officers to face trial over allegations of a coup against President Bola Tinubu - BBC
item.description: Nigerian officers to face trial over allegations of a coup against President Bola Tinubu BBCSeveral Nigerian military officers will be tried on accusations they plotted a coup AP NewsCoup: 16 indicted officers to face court-martial — DHQ Vanguard NewsNigeria to Charge Military Officers Over Alleged Coup Plot Bloomberg.comDHQ finally confirms coup plot against Tinubu TheCable

item.title: Nigerian officers to face trial over coup-plot allegations
item.description: Following an investigation some of the 16 detained last year are accused of planning to unseat President Bola Tinubu.
